verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Today bring to me those
who do not believe in God
and those who do not
yet know me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I was thinking also of them
during My bitter Passion,
and their future zeal
comforted my heart.
Immerse them in the ocean
of my Mercy.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Most compassionate Jesus,
Your are the light of the
whole world.
Receive into the abode of
your most compassionate heart
the souls of those who as yet
do not believe in you
or do not know you.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let the rays of your grace
enlighten them that they, too,
together with us,
may extol your wonderful mercy,
and do not let them escape from
the abode which is your
most compassionate heart.

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Eternal Father,
turn your merciful gaze
upon the souls of those who
do not believe in your Son,
and of those who as yet
do not know you,
but who are enclosed in the
most compassionate heart
of Jesus.

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Draw them to the light
of the Gospel.
These souls do not know what
great happiness it is to
love you.
Grant that they too,
mau extol the generosity of
your mercy for endless ages.
Amen.
